venue.name: Second Wind Coffee House (formerly Cafe Aiello)

item.description:
Here's the description, from lowellfilmcollaborative.org:

"Gather with friends and enjoy an intimate cafe evening by the fire! Live music provided by Cemetery Blues and super eerie sounds by Living Horror. Bring your favorite spooky story or bone-chilling poem and warm up with hot cocoa, cider, and other festive menu items! Your $5 admission will benefit the Lowell Film Collaborative's future film events."

I [Neil] will be singing my famous rendition of "The Monster Mash".

5 PM - 8 PM.

I suspect I will not be able to save space for people, so get there early.
I have never been to this place but I think it is relatively small.
The name of the place just recently changed from Cafe Aiello to Second Wind.
If any of you Lowell people can tell me more about the place, I would appreciate it.

I will be posting this to multiple meetup groups.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: An Evening of Spooky Fireside Stories, Poetry and Live Music
